TEXT.S: bugan 1. mkmugah mkmugah saku ga mngungu saku kks'ang ay ni yaba mu. 2. pbugah maha maki saku kya ga,pbugah saku ay. 3. ppbugah yasa ppbugah saku lga,mhtuw yaba mu la. 4. mugah nyux saku mugah na huzil qani gauw. 5. mnugah mnugah saku mrusa maku mnaki su inu,swa musu in ktay? 6. bnugah bnugah maku gaw....
